p: These developments make MR increasingly accessible, enabling ‘high-throughput’ projects such as an online platform collating over 5000 GWASs to facilitate MR for Parkinson’s disease ( Noyce et al., 2019 ). Nonetheless, it remains crucial to perform MR studies with a reasoned approach, carefully tailored to the research question ( Burgess and Davey Smith, 2019). Together with ethnically diverse data and GWASs for progression ( Blauwendraat et al., 2019 ; Iwaki et al., 2019 ), these resources will expedite MR for neurodegenerative disease prevention and drug development.
